LanguageData.LotRE_BakeElvishBread.label: Bake Elven bread loaf
LanguageData.LotRE_BakeElvishBread.description: Bake delicious Elven bread, which can be used to make Elven waybread. \n\nMakes 1 loaf.
LanguageData.LotRE_PrepareLembas.label: Prepare lembas
LanguageData.LotRE_PrepareLembas.description: Prepare longlasting waybread, or lembas, which is far superior to survival meals in a pinch. \n\nMakes 2 lembas.
LanguageData.LotRE_CraftLembasflour.label: Grind lembas flour
LanguageData.LotRE_CraftLembasflour.description: Grind lembas corn into lembas flour.
LanguageData.LotRE_CraftBulkLembasFlour.label: Grind bulk lembas flour
LanguageData.LotRE_CraftBulkLembasFlour.description: Grind lembas corn into lembas flour.
